mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, is_deleted, group_name, description
mapper.select:
select schedulers_group.*, create_user.username as create_username, update_user.username as update_username from qrtz_schedulers_group schedulers_group left join sys_user create_user on create_user.id = schedulers_group.create_user left join sys_user update_user on update_user.id = schedulers_group.update_user
schedulers_group.is_deleted = 0
and schedulers_group.group_name like CONCAT('%',#{dto.groupName},'%')
and schedulers_group.description like CONCAT('%',#{dto.description},'%')
